main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Cheviot, Ohio on April 29, 1967, where the observer described an object that moved and changed direction before going out of sight.
interesting points: The object was observed for about 3 minutes, During the sighting, the object appeared to move in a circular pattern and then stopped before changing direction, The observer described the object as having a greenish glow, A sketch with an irregularly shaped object was provided by the observer, The object was estimated to be slightly more than a mile away and could reach speeds of approximately 1,800 mph.
sighted object: irregularly shaped object with a greenish glow
witness description: male, 20 years old, lived in Cheviot, Ohio, with a background related to photography and electronics
